name: Tofu Salad with Quinoa
author: mercyp
summary: This super easy tofu salad is both extremely nutritious and a quick throw-together main dish salad. Serve it in place of rice or pasta salad, but don't forget to make enough to take the leftovers for lunch the next day!
ingredients: 2 teaspoons soy sauce, or to taste
1 teaspoon Chinese hot mustard, or to taste
directions: Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a medium saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally
Meanwhile, place a steamer basket into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add edamame, cover, and steam until tender, 2 to 6 minutes
Place edamame into a large bowl with tofu; add soy sauce and mustard
Mix in cooked quinoa and serve warm or chilled
